thought.text:
I notice something important! Look at line 1465: `self.diff_total += len(set(diffs[0]))`. This assumes that `diffs` is a tuple where `diffs[0]` contains the indices. But in the VLA case (lines 1452-1461), `diffs` is just a list, not a tuple with the indices in `diffs[0]`.

This is a bug! Let me look at the structure more carefully:
